languages.text: {n}В стороне от сирот вы замечаете Инфернус-мастера. Он взирает на вас с явным одобрением и почтительно кланяется, ловя ваш взгляд.{/n}
{n}You notice Infernus Master Einrich Monteg standing a few paces away from the orphans. He watches you with approval and bows respectfully when you meet his gaze.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В стороне от сирот вы замечаете Инфернус-мастера. Он взирает на вас с явным одобрением и почтительно кланяется, ловя ваш взгляд.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du bemerkst Infernus-Meister Einrich Monteg, der in der Nähe der Waisenkinder steht. Er beobachtet dich zustimmend und verneigt sich respektvoll, als sich Eure Blicke treffen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice Infernus Master Einrich Monteg standing a few paces away from the orphans. He watches you with approval and bows respectfully when you meet his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die bemerkst Infernus-Meister Einrich Monteg, der in der Nähe der Waisenkinder steht. Er beobachtet dich zustimmend und verneigt sich respektvoll, als sich Eure Blicke treffen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous apercevez le maître-infernus Einrich Monteg, à quelques pas des orphelins. Il vous observe d'un air approbateur et vous adresse un hochement de tête empreint de respect lorsque vos regards se croisent.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice Infernus Master Einrich Monteg standing a few paces away from the orphans. He watches you with approval and bows respectfully when you meet his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous apercevez le maître-infernus Einrich Monteg, à quelques pas des orphelins. Il vous observe d'un air approbateur et vous adresse un hochement de tête empreint de respect lorsque vos regards se croisent.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ves al maestro de infernus, Einrich Monteg, a pocos pasos de los huérfanos. Te observa con aprobación y te hace una reverencia cuando le miras a los ojos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice Infernus Master Einrich Monteg standing a few paces away from the orphans. He watches you with approval and bows respectfully when you meet his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ves al maestro de infernus, Einrich Monteg, a pocos pasos de los huérfanos. Te observa con aprobación y te hace una reverencia cuando le miras a los ojos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたはインフェルヌス・マスターのアインリッヒ・モンテグが孤児たちから数歩離れた場所に立っていることに気づく。視線が合うと、彼は敬意を表してお辞儀をした。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice Infernus Master Einrich Monteg standing a few paces away from the orphans. He watches you with approval and bows respectfully when you meet his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたはインフェルヌス・マスターのアインリッヒ・モンテグが孤児たちから数歩離れた場所に立っていることに気づく。視線が合うと、彼は敬意を表してお辞儀をした。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你注意到控火大师艾因里奇·蒙特格站在离那些孤儿几步之遥的地方。他赞许地看着你，当你们两人目光相接时，他恭敬地鞠了一躬。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice Infernus Master Einrich Monteg standing a few paces away from the orphans. He watches you with approval and bows respectfully when you meet his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你注意到控火大师艾因里奇·蒙特格站在离那些孤儿几步之遥的地方。他赞许地看着你，当你们两人目光相接时，他恭敬地鞠了一躬。{/n}

languages.text: {n}İtfa Üstadı Einrich Monteg'nin yetimlerden birkaç adım uzakta durduğunu fark ediyorsun. Seni tasvip ederek izliyor. Göz göze geldiğinizdeyse hürmetkârlıkla önünde eğiliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice Infernus Master Einrich Monteg standing a few paces away from the orphans. He watches you with approval and bows respectfully when you meet his gaze.{/n}
